Also, After the Reboot, Each Kamen rider is somewhat distinct

Kuuga is Like the old ones crossed with a police Drama, Ryuki is like Highlander, Faiz is bleak and hopeless (At least I've heard it is) Kabuto is crazy awesome, Den-O is comedic. (And I think you get my point)

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cdac816368727c97320100#post_53cdac816368727c97320100
I love campy stuff, (And serious stuff) The characters are Great, The Action is quite good, (Even in the ones that have cheap special effects) Rider Kick! The Monsters and the riders have some really great designs.

And I feel that they're very well made considering the Hurdles they have to go through.

topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cdad3a6368727dd4d20100#post_53cdad3a6368727dd4d20100

Good idea.


"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cdad786368727b95f40100#post_53cdad786368727b95f40100

Well done. Now, let's say someone doesn't like it for the same reasons. Why would his opinion makes him a bad person or someone who doesn't appreciates it the same way you do? Let's not go _that_ far, let's just say that you list all those things, but someone who is not into that sort of stuff and is not interested in watching, why would his opinion, should be wrong according to you?
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cdae40636872410c060000#post_53cdae40636872410c060000
Because I feel that Metal gear rising and Kamen rider have a lot in Common.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cdae7463687243b2150000#post_53cdae7463687243b2150000

Yes, they might have similarities, just like Star Wars has similarities with Flash Gordon, that doesn't mean someone is obliged to watch both if one genre doesn't attract his attention. 

That's the whole point of this, you can make a whole study on how Kamen Rider and Tokusatsu in general shares many plot elements and nods to others series, true. That doesn't mean it's going to appeal to everyone.
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cdad786368727b95f40100#post_53cdad786368727b95f40100
Ok, how bout this?
I like MGR because:
The bosses are easily some if most memorable bosses I've played
The gameplay is fun and sharp
The cutscenes are hilarious, awesome, or hilariously awesome.
Fun main character
Edgy as fuck, but in a good way
Everything about Sundowner
OUT OF THIS WORLD SOUNDTRACK
Nanomachines
Son

You see? You probably won't agree with what I said but that proved my point. I have my reasons for liking stuff.
